# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by me due to its unique features and high-quality materials used. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at this special offer price of $120. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece that truly stands out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
